[[File:Bag_Dragon_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Dragon Egg]] A '''Dragon Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Dragon-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | [[File:Dratini.png|40px]] Dratini || | || [[File:Bagon.png|40px]] Bagon || [[File:Gible.png|40px]] Gible || [[File:Deino.png|40px]] Deino || |- | [[File:Dragonair.png|40px]] Dragonair || | || [[File:Shelgon.png|40px]] Shelgon || [[File:Gabite.png|40px]] Gabite || [[File:Zweilous.png|40px]] Zweilous || |- | [[File:Dragonite.png|40px]] Dragonite || | || [[File:Salamence.png|40px]] Salamence || [[File:Garchomp.png|40px]] Garchomp || [[File:Hydreigon.png|40px]] Hydreigon || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Fuchsia City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Blackthorn City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Ever Grande City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Celestic Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Icirrus City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Couriway Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
